## GenericMathNode.(constructor)

Creates a new generic math node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(func: string, numArgs: number, outType?: string, inTypes?: string[], explicitInTypes?: Record<number, string[]>, additionalInTypes?: Record<number, string[]>, originTypes?: string[]);
```

</td></tr>

## Remarks

Creates input slots named 'a', 'b', 'c', etc. based on numArgs. All inputs are required by default.
